cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP port to 0 causes an invalid port number that is out of range, leading to unreachable SCTP connection and routing failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting the downlink timing parameter T1a_cp_dl[0] to 0 causes timing misalignment, as it is out of the valid range, resulting in invalid timing configuration and synchronization failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行鏈路定時參數 T1a_cp_dl[0] 設定為 0 會導致定時錯位，因為它超出了有效範圍，導致無效的定時配置和同步失敗。
